--- select_singer_with_table_alias.sql
SELECT
  S.*,
  S.SingerId as ID,
  S.FirstName
FROM Singers S

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.DotStar{
        Star: 11,
        Expr: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 9,
          NameEnd: 10,
          Name:    "S",
        },
      },
      &ast.Alias{
        Expr: &ast.Path{
          Idents: []*ast.Ident{
            &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 16,
              NameEnd: 17,
              Name:    "S",
            },
            &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 18,
              NameEnd: 26,
              Name:    "SingerId",
            },
          },
        },
        As: &ast.AsAlias{
          As:    27,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 30,
            NameEnd: 32,
            Name:    "ID",
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.Path{
          Idents: []*ast.Ident{
            &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 36,
              NameEnd: 37,
              Name:    "S",
            },
            &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 38,
              NameEnd: 47,
              Name:    "FirstName",
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   48,
      Source: &ast.TableName{
        Table: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 53,
          NameEnd: 60,
          Name:    "Singers",
        },
        Hint: (*ast.Hint)(nil),
        As:   &ast.AsAlias{
          As:    -1,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 61,
            NameEnd: 62,
            Name:    "S",
          },
        },
        Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
      },
    },
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT S.*, S.SingerId AS ID, S.FirstName FROM Singers S
